name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook the spaghetti. Brown the beef with onion and garlic. Add tomato sauce and simmer. Serve the sauce over the spaghetti.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Brown the chicken with onion and garlic. Add curry powder and cook for a minute. Add coconut milk and simmer until chicken is cooked.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter the bread. Place cheese between two slices of bread. Grill until golden brown.
